ygData.subject: Re: Question for Befallen Buffs
ygData.msgSnippet: The Blackened Wand is half of marneks wand and is part of the monks quest for the red sash. The other half of the wand is the blackened sapphire which is found
ygData.messageBody:
The Blackened Wand is half of marneks wand and is part of the monks quest
for the red sash. The other half of the wand is the blackened sapphire which
is found in third level of beffalien on the priest.


----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Harrell <jharrell@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 4:50 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Question for Befallen Buffs


> From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>
>
> What's the blackened wand for?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sandeep Shekar [mailto:sandeep@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 11:22 AM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Question for Befallen Buffs
>
>
> From: Sandeep Shekar <sandeep@...>
>
> >We went down in hopes of getting a BBC for our Pally last night. We were
> >there for two hours or so, and never saw the SK. We were told that there
> is
> >a "spawn line", ie, don't cross it or the SK will not spawn. Is this the
> >case? If so, is that line at the end of the tunnel? Or inside the room?
> >It was fairly frustrating. Also, there was another group there camping
for
> >the Robes, and I never saw that Theor..they...whatever guy that is
supposed
> >to drop the robes. Does the same thing apply for him?
>
> I spent about 3 days in Befallen and my parties got a total of 5 BBCs, 3
> Thaum robes and 2 Gossamier robes, countless daggers of Marknek, and not a
> single blackened wand (the item I was looking for). There is NO spawn
line
> or any kind of anti camp radius on ANY of the mobs in befallen. I've been
> standing next to mobs when they spawned with the aforementioned items.
>
> >Lastly..how often would you say the SK would normally spawn? Every 1/2
> >hour? Hour? 2 hours? I probably will not return to Befallen, unless it
> is
> >with my Paladin with the objective of getting that BBC for him....so the
> >info would be appreciated. That place is just swarming with DE's, and it
> >makes my dwarven skin crawl.
>
> Yeah, I hate the place too. The spawn time in Befallen is about 20
> minutes, and the SK spawns about 25% of the time. About 33% of the time
> that he spawns, he has a BBC. So I guess if you are looking for a BBC,
> plan on being there for 3-4 hours or so. I hate camping, so I'd just run
> the entire 3rd floor - Thaum room, Darkelf SK, and Troll SK. We still
> ended up at the start of the spawn cycle before the 20 minutes was up. I
> hate this dungeon.
>
> Sandeep Shekar
>
